summary: HeroSection now references the requested new logo filename, but the diff does not add the actual image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated. Additional unrequested metadata/tracking changes were made in project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the user-uploaded brand logo as a static image asset under frontend/public/assets/generated with a stable filename.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff, and there is no evidence of an image being placed under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state to add/track feature requests (AR-1, AR-2) and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to replace the hero wordmark with the uploaded logo; it did not request changes to project_state.json.
BuildRequest did not request updating summary/metadata files.
